about.ambitious:
In my past project work, my analytical thinking, creativity and ambition have helped me a lot.
Last but not least, I also promote the progress of new projects through team spirit.
about.intro: Hey there, I'm Bastian! Working on the computer has always been one of my great passions. My further training as a front-end developer introduced me to new and interesting facets of IT and made me realise that I would like to make this passion my everyday profession.
about.locate: I'm from a village near the beautiful City Brunswick. I would like to work near Brunswick and Hanover. But in principle I wouldn't mind working remotely.
about.mindset: I am always motivated to learn everything about new technologies and to improve my skills. Be it with object-orientated JS, building a small database with Firebase or working with Typescript in Angular and Angular Material.
contact.errorMessagePlaceholder: What do you need to develop?
contact.errorNamePlaceholder: Oops! It seems your name is missing
contact.intrest: If you're interested in collaborating, feel free to contact me and let me know which role you envision. I’m eager to contribute my skills and develop innovative solutions for your projects. With my dedication and expertise, I will add real value to your initiatives.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Hello Bastian, I am interested in...
contact.name: What's your name?
contact.read2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
featured.explore: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

projects.dabubble.name: DA Bubble (soon)
projects.elPolloLoco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
projects.elPolloLoco.name: EL Pollo Loco
projects.join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.join.name: Join
references.first.description.0: I got to know Bastian as a likeable, collegial person who is always ready to help. He is happy to pass on his in-depth knowledge and really tries his best to solve any problem, no matter how complex, even under time pressure. It was always a pleasure to work on a project with him.
references.first.description.1: Bastian is a colleague who is always a pleasure to work with. I found him to be very determined and problem-orientated. Solving the odd problem with him was almost fun.
references.first.description.2: I have always greatly appreciated Bastian as a member of the group. He is always proactive and team-orientated. No one is left behind with him. That was a great relief for me as a somewhat inexperienced colleague.
references.title: What my colleagues say about me
skills.description: I have experience in HTML, CSS, JS, Material Design, TS, Angular, Firebase, Git, REST APIs, and Scrum. I’m keen to learn React and Vue to further expand my skills. Keeping pace with rapid changes in web development is essential for me.
skills.fell-free: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
skills.special: I have a special interest in learning
